title: Ka-52 Alligator: Sound System + Flight Model
description: The Ka-52 Alligator Sound System is an easily customizable flight model and about 65 sounds, including engine, rotors and weapon effects for cockpit, exterior and distant views with implemented replication. Ideal for AAA multiplayer shooters.
longDescription:
VIDEO PREVIEW | HOW TO USE VIDEO

The Ka-52 Alligator Helicopter Sound System - a plugin crafted in C++ with Blueprints for the Unreal Engine platform for Kamov Ka-50 and Ka-52 helicopters.


  • Easily customizable helicopter flight model
  • The most realistic engine sounds
  • Different sounds from different RPMs, speed, yaw and other helicopter's parameters
  • Weapon sounds from the weapons used by this helicopter in real life
  • Different sounds for cockpit, exterior, and distant views
  • Startup and Shutdown sounds
  • Cockpit sounds
  • Multiplayer Replication for movement and sounds
  • Ideal for AAA multiplayer shooter games


This plugin offers an easily configurable flight model for the Ka-52 helicopter. And it features meticulously crafted audio based on real audio recordings, dynamically adjusting sounds for exterior, distant, and cockpit views to mirror the flight model parameters. Over 35 high-quality helicopter engine sounds and about 25 weapon sounds, including the 30 mm Shipunov 2A42 cannon, Single and Burst fire of rockets, complement the realistic battle atmosphere. And supported by replication for use in multiplayer AAA projects.


Our advanced sound system realistically reproduces engine sounds, rotor sounds, overload rotor sounds, airflow, cabin shake and much more, reflecting every change in helicopter's parameters such as engine RPM, rotor RPM, helicopter speed, etc.


The Ka-52 Alligator Helicopter sound system captures the essence of the Ka-52, from the rumble of its engines to the thunderous roar of its weapons systems. Whether you're soaring through the skies or engaging in intense combat scenarios, every sound is carefully crafted to heighten your immersion and bring the helicopter to life like never before.
technicalDetails:
Code Module:Â KA52_SoundSystem (Runtime Module)

Number of Blueprints: 7

Number of C++ Classes: 7

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows


KA-52 ALLIGATOR HELICOPTER SOUND SYSTEM DEMONSTRATION: VIDEO

HOW TO USE IT WITH OUR READY-MADE SCENE AND FLIGHT MODEL: VIDEO


  • Enable "KA52_SoundSystem " from Installed and "Windows RawInput" from Built-In plugins from "Edit > Plugins".
  • Set up the audio settings of your project as described in the 'How to Use' video.
  • Restart UE5.
  • Open "DemoLevel" from the plugin content folder.
  • FLY!!!


Check KA52_FlightModel_BP and KA52_SFX_Component_BP Actor Components in the KA52_Helicopter_BP to adjust Flight Model and Sound settings.


You can find all plugin content in Content Browser. Make sure the checkboxes Bottom right of the "Content Browser > View Options > Show Engine Content" and "Content Browser > View Options > Show Plugin Content" are checked.
